name: Palaha
description:
Kalaha is a 2-player abstract game that I like, so I wrote a version for the Pico-8 (which I also like!)! Written and debugged in about 3 evenings, so it's still a little shonky, but all the basic rules are there -- planning on working on the music more in future :)

arrow keys - move selector

z - sow seeds

x - reset game
